casebody.data:
PITTS
v.
NASH DAY HOSPITAL. No. 22A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 22, 2005. Barry S. Cobb, James T. Newman, Jr., Raleigh, for Harris, Wilson & OB-GYN Assoc. Charles Albert, for Jennifer L. Pitts. James M. Williams, Anne W. Ford, Asheville, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of March *1382005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed until April 13, 2005. Plaintiff (Jennifer L. Pitts) shall have up to and including the 13th day of April 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of March 2005."
